## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Content refactoring

## Testing

- [ ] Documentation builds successfully (`mkdocs build`)
- [ ] Links are valid and working
- [ ] Content renders correctly locally (`mkdocs serve`)
- [ ] Manual testing completed

## Checklist

- [ ] My content follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own content
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to navigation (mkdocs.yml) if needed
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have tested that the documentation builds without errors
- [ ] New and existing documentation renders correctly
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

## Content Guidelines

- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or credentials
- [ ] No sensitive data exposed
- [ ] All external links are valid
- [ ] Images are optimized and accessible
